ygData.subject: Re: PoA bard quests plus a rant
ygData.msgSnippet: Oh yah as for the tests go run them with some people on your server I think you ll find them to be quite accurate. Naeeldar ... From: kim@stormhaven.org
ygData.messageBody:
Oh yah as for the tests go run them with some people on your server I think
you'll find them to be quite accurate.

Naeeldar

-----Original Message-----
From: kim@... <kim@...>
To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Friday, January 28, 2000 2:01 PM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] PoA bard quests plus a rant


>From: <kim@...>
>
>On Fri, 28 Jan 2000, Naeeldar wrote:
>>
>> did. As for the sea furies ask somebody who was hunting there early on
they
>> arte just cyclops with a upgrade in level and hp. They forgot to raise
the
>> ac and attack rating. That's why when I go after gornit my pet loses a
ton
>> more hp.
>
>Well, I assure you that as of 3 months ago they are fixed now
>and much much harder than giants. So much so that we decided
>they were too hard for their /con and not worth the
>experience. Gornit was a piece of cake after them.
>
>--
>John H. Kim
